note: The study finds that training increased managerial productivity by 22.4 percent, while coaching increased productivity by 88 percent.
title: Executive Coaching as a Transfer of Training Tool: Effects on Productivity in a Public Agency” that appeared in Public Personnel Management

Summary: Describes the advantages of one-on-one executive coaching in positively inf luencing transfer of training. Examines the effects of executive coaching in a local government agency. Thirty-one managers took a management development program, followed by eight weeks of one-on-one executive coaching
Antecedents and Consequences of Coaching Behavior

Summary: Discusses the use of coaching to facilitate the development of learning organizations. Presents the results of a study to determine the outcomes of coaching interventions. Finds that managers’ commitment to coaching can impact employee, manager, and organizational performance
Rating the Returns

Summary: Outlines a nine-step ROI process that determines the value of executive coaching. Claims that this process must be applied consistently through the organization. Includes a list of measurement tools and important ROI measurements
In fact, five of the coaches have been coaches or mentors for me: Frances Hesselbein
Try Feedforward Instead of Feedback
Coaching for Behavioral Change
The Leadership Challenge
for a comprehensive discussion of the Five Practices of Exemplary LeadershipTM, the research behind them, and real-life stories of leaders who serve as exemplary leadership role models

note: for more detail. Chapter 6: Coaching for Leadership Development
title: The Leadership Practices Inventory
Crossing the Unknown Seas: Work as a Pilgrimage of Identity
The Art of Possibility
The Active Life: A Spirituality of Work, Creativity, and Caring

For an excellent example, see the work of Rob Nickerson (www.robnickerson.ca), who originally worked with Toronto’s famous improv group, The Second City, and now works around the world providing interactive, improv-based workshops, seminars, and keynotes to a wide range of industries and audiences
The Heart Aroused
